canvases.label: Holmestrand Harbour, South Georgia, Envelope No.25

metadata.value: Salvage of W/C. 'Shova', 'Subra', right, and another catcher on the job. When fishing winter 1919 'Shova' had to seek refuge in Holmestrand Hbr. She ran on an underwater rock and sunk. She was salvaged and repaired again the same year. Fishing again season 1919/20. Diver and foreman Antell was in charge of the job, which was considered a very splendid one. The saying is that he got a bonus of Kr.10.000.
metadata.label: Repro Description
